ordersInfo: This page publishes all official orders and directives of the educational institution. Here you will find up-to-date information on admission rules, organization of the educational process, scholarship provision, and other important aspects of educational activities.
ordersInfoText: All documents are presented in PDF format and available for download. Orders are published in chronological order, starting with the most recent.

ordersData.title: Order No.42 on the establishment of a Conciliation Commission for resolving individual labor disputes
ordersData.description: Approval of the composition of the Conciliation Commission, including representatives of the employer and employees, rules of operation, and duties of commission members

ordersData.title: Order No.123 on measures for organizing public procurement
ordersData.description: Approval of the composition of commissions for conducting public procurement of goods, works, and services, list of members, and their roles

ordersData.title: Order No.493 on the prohibition of collecting funds in the college
ordersData.description: Prohibition on collecting money in the college, approval of preventive measures, staff responsibilities, and monitoring of compliance

ordersData.title: Order No.239 on the formation of anti-corruption culture
ordersData.description: Approval of the action plan for developing an anti-corruption culture, including seminars, monitoring, and reporting

ordersData.title: Order No.366 on the establishment of the Council on Pedagogical Ethics
ordersData.description: Approval of the composition of the Council on Pedagogical Ethics, list of members, responsibilities, and work plan of the council
